name: Reflex (itch)
description:
ReFleX
Mini-Game by JuneGames

How To Play :
ZQSD or WASD = Moving
Shift = Sprinting
Right Click : Shooting
Escape : Quit Game

ReFlex is a survival game, you have to to survive as long as possible.
The ennemies are the red cubes, they are invincible and multiplies every 5 seconds.
The Score is counted with the survival time.

Thank for playing
Enjoy !

Facebook Page of juneGames for now we write in french but we will make translations in English https://www.facebook.com/JuneGames-205215916522459/
